section.title: Verify operation
section.para: Verify operation of the Identity service before installing other services.

note.para: Perform these commands on the controller node.

step.para: Unset the temporary OS_AUTH_URL and OS_PASSWORD environment variable:
As the admin user, request an authentication token:
step.screen:
$ openstack --os-auth-url http://controller:35357/v3 \ --os-project-domain-name Default --os-user-domain-name Default \ --os-project-name admin --os-username admin token issue
